mapper.select: select TiNo as ticNo,StuNO as stuNo,StuName as stuName,Class as stuClazz,Book_name as bookName,T_time as ticTime,T_money as ticMoney,moneyed as isMoney,pay_way as payWay from ticket where Book_name like #{username} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(TiNo) from ticket where Book_name like #{username}
mapper.update: update ticket set StuNO = #{stuNo},StuName = #{stuName},Class = #{stuClazz},Book_name = #{bookName},T_time = #{ticTime},T_money = #{ticMoney},moneyed = #{isMoney},pay_way = #{payWay} where TiNo = #{ticNo}
delete from ticket where TiNo in (${value})
